text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh, 'iidha tulb minkum 'an ywse baedukum libaed almajalis fawseu, ywse allah ealaykum fi aldunya walakhrt, wa'iidha talab mnkm- 'ayuha almwmnwn- 'an taqumuu min mjalskm li'amr min al'umur alty yakun fiha khayr lakum fqwmu, yarfae allah mkant almuminin almukhlasin mnkm, wyrfe mkant 'ahl aleilm darajat kathirat fi althawab wmratb alrdwan, wallah taealaa khabir baemalkm la yakhfaa ealayh shay' mnha, wahu mjazykm elyha. wafi alayat tnwyh bmkant aleulama' wfdlhm, warafae drjathm
